==== Summary ====

Hello, I am Pat K. I am almost 13 years of age and do some limited developing. I am the maintainer for <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/simpleunitconverter|SimpleUnitConverter]]</nowiki> and the owner of it's <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~simpleunitconverter-devel|development team]]</nowiki>.

=== Ubuntu ===

I am doing some limited participation in the community. I answer most of the questions I can answer, and that's about it.

=== SimpleUnitConverter ===
SimpleUnitConverter is a FOSS unit converter, written by me in C. More information can be found <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/simpleunitconverter|here]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://sites.google.com/site/simpleunitconverter/|here]]</nowiki>.
